tooltip.rarcompat.mimi_dust: When used on a chest, it transforms it into a mimic that drops as many random relics as it originally contained before the transformation.
tooltip.relics.umbrella.description: Softens the fall, providing safe landing from any height. When skillfully used, it can serve as a reliable shield, keeping enemies at bay.
tooltip.relics.umbrella.ability.glider.d: When held in hand, reduces the player's vertical speed, negating fall damage. Pressing LMB propels the player backward and triggers a cooldown of %2$s seconds. The push can be used up to %1$s times in succession before the player touches the ground.
tooltip.relics.umbrella.ability.shield.d: When used, functions as a shield, pushing targets up to %1$s blocks away.
+%1$s experience points for each second of falling.
+%1$s experience points for each mid-air dash performed using the %2$s ability.
+%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.plastic_drinking_hat.desc: Speeds up the drinking process, not only quickly quenching thirst but also replenishing hunger in an extraordinary way.
tooltip.relics.plastic_drinking_hat.abil: Increases drinking speed by %1$s%%. Works on potions and any other items with a drinking animation.
Replenishes %1$s hunger points when consuming liquids. Works on potions and any other items with a drinking animation.
tooltip.relics.plastic_drinking_hat.leve: +%1$s experience points for each consumed drink.
tooltip.relics.novelty_drinking_hat.desc: Speeds up the drinking process, not only quickly quenching thirst but also replenishing hunger in an extraordinary way.
tooltip.relics.novelty_drinking_hat.abil: Increases drinking speed by %1$s%%. Works on potions and any other items with a drinking animation.
Replenishes %1$s hunger points when consuming liquids. Works on potions and any other items with a drinking animation.
tooltip.relics.novelty_drinking_hat.leve: +%1$s experience points for each consumed drink.
tooltip.relics.snorkel.description: Allows for longer underwater exploration without the risk of drowning.
tooltip.relics.snorkel.ability.diving.de: Applies a water breathing effect for %1$s seconds upon full submersion.
tooltip.relics.snorkel.ability.passive.d: Removes the fog effect in liquids.
tooltip.relics.snorkel.leveling_source.d: +%1$s experience points for each second of the water breathing effect from the %2$s ability. If the player already has a water breathing effect, its duration is subtracted from the gained experience proportionally.
tooltip.relics.villager_hat.description: Reduces trading prices with villagers, making deals more profitable.
tooltip.relics.villager_hat.ability.disc: Increases the discount when trading with villagers by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.villager_hat.ability.pass: Prevents Iron Golems from attacking the player.
tooltip.relics.villager_hat.leveling_sou: +%1$s experience points for each trade with villagers. The amount of experience gained increases by the discount value provided by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.superstitious_hat.descrip: Increases loot drops from defeated mobs.
tooltip.relics.superstitious_hat.ability: Has a %1$s%% chance to apply an additional level of Looting to defeated mobs. If successful, the ability repeats, adding another Looting level. This continues until the chance fails, summing all levels.
tooltip.relics.superstitious_hat.levelin: +%1$s experience points for each additional level of Looting activated by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.anglers_hat.ability.catch: Has a %1$s%% chance to increase the amount of catch received. If successful, the ability repeats, adding more catch. This continues until the chance fails, summing all catches.
tooltip.relics.anglers_hat.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for each additional catch generated by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.lucky_scarf.description: Increases Luck level when mining blocks.
Has a %1$s%% chance to apply an additional level of Luck to mined blocks. If successful, the ability repeats, adding another Luck level. This continues until the chance fails, summing all levels.
tooltip.relics.lucky_scarf.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for each additional level of Luck activated by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.scarf_of_invisibility.des: When moving carefully, makes the player invisible to surroundings.
tooltip.relics.scarf_of_invisibility.abi: Grants the player complete invisibility. The effect is lost for %1$s seconds upon any interaction with the world. If during the absence of invisibility any mob targets the player, the effect will not restore until that mob won't lose sight of the player.
tooltip.relics.scarf_of_invisibility.lev: +%1$s experience points for each use of the %2$s ability to become invisible.
tooltip.relics.flame_pendant.description: Burns anyone who dares to attack the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.flame_pendant.ability.fir: Has a %2$s%% chance to ignite the target attacking the player for %1$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.flame_pendant.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.shock_pendant.description: Strikes with lightning anyone who dares to attack the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.shock_pendant.ability.pas: Grants complete resistance to lightning damage.
tooltip.relics.shock_pendant.ability.lig: Has a %2$s%% chance to strike the target attacking the player with lightning, dealing %1$s damage.
tooltip.relics.shock_pendant.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.thorn_pendant.description: Poisons anyone who dares to attack the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.thorn_pendant.ability.poi: Has a %3$s%% chance to reflect %1$s%% damage and apply poison to the target attacking the player for %2$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.thorn_pendant.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.cowboy_hat.description: Enhances the agility of the relic bearerâ€™s mounts.
tooltip.relics.cowboy_hat.ability.cowboy: Increases the movement speed, jump height, and safe fall height of mounts by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.cowboy_hat.ability.overlo: When used, this ability allows you to ride and control any mob for up to %1$s seconds. After the time expires or dismounting, it goes on a 1-minute cooldown.
tooltip.relics.cowboy_hat.leveling_sourc: +%1$s experience points with a 25% chance for each second of riding.
+%1$s experience points for each use of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.crystal_heart.description: Grants the relic bearer extra strength by increasing their maximum health.
tooltip.relics.crystal_heart.ability.hea: Increases the player's maximum health by %1$s points.
tooltip.relics.crystal_heart.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each instance of health regeneration. The probability of gaining experience is inversely proportional to the ratio of current health to maximum health.
tooltip.relics.universal_attractor.descr: Manipulates a weak magnetic field around the relic bearer, controlling the gravity of nearby items.
tooltip.relics.universal_attractor.abili: A toggleable ability with 3 modes: Attraction, Repulsion, and Neutrality. In the red Attraction mode, items within a radius of %1$s blocks are drawn toward the player. In the blue Repulsion mode, items are pushed away. The purple Neutrality mode disables the relic's effect.
tooltip.relics.universal_attractor.level: +%1$s experience points for each item picked up using the %2$s ability. The probability of gaining experience is directly proportional to the ratio of current item count in the stack to its maximum capacity. Does not work if the item was dropped by the relic bearer.
tooltip.relics.cross_necklace.descriptio: Envelops the relic bearer in a protective aura, granting temporary invulnerability after each hit taken.
tooltip.relics.cross_necklace.ability.in: Increases the duration of invulnerability after taking damage by %1$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.cross_necklace.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each instance of damage taken.
tooltip.relics.night_vision_goggles.desc: Allows the relic bearer to see more clearly in the dark.
tooltip.relics.night_vision_goggles.abil: Enhances the brightness of poorly lit areas and reduces the effectiveness of blindness and darkness by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.night_vision_goggles.leve: +%1$s experience points for every 5 seconds of movement in darkness. The probability of gaining experience is directly proportional to the current light level ratio at the player's location to the maximum.
tooltip.relics.cloud_in_a_bottle.descrip: Enhances the relic bearer's agility, allowing for additional jumps in the air.
tooltip.relics.cloud_in_a_bottle.ability: Allows up to %1$s additional air jumps.
tooltip.relics.cloud_in_a_bottle.levelin: +%1$s experience points for each additional jump performed using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.vampiric_glove.descriptio: Grants the relic bearer's attacks a vampiric effect, healing them by a portion of the damage dealt.
tooltip.relics.vampiric_glove.ability.va: Heals the player for %1$s%% of the damage dealt.
tooltip.relics.vampiric_glove.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability. The probability of gaining experience is directly proportional to the ratio of healing received to the player's maximum health.
tooltip.relics.golden_hook.description: Allows the relic bearer to perform more precise attacks, retaining more experience from killed mobs.
Increases experience gained from killing mobs by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.golden_hook.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.onion_ring.description: Enhances the relic bearer's block mining efficiency when sufficiently satiated.
Increases block mining speed by %1$s%% per unit of the player's saturation.
tooltip.relics.onion_ring.ability.satura: When mining blocks, there is a %1$s%% chance to restore 1 hunger point and 0.5 saturation to the player.
tooltip.relics.onion_ring.leveling_sourc: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
+%1$s experience points for each block mined. The chance of gaining experience is directly proportional to current saturation. Does not work on blocks with instant break.
tooltip.relics.digging_claws.description: Strengthens the relic bearer's hands, allowing them to chop through any blocks more effectively.
tooltip.relics.digging_claws.ability.pas: Reduces the required tool level for all blocks by 1.
tooltip.relics.digging_claws.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each mined block. The probability of gaining experience is directly proportional to the block's toughness. Does not work on blocks with instant destruction.
tooltip.relics.feral_claws.description: Awakens a bloodthirsty instinct in the relic bearer, making them fight faster with each consecutive attack.
tooltip.relics.feral_claws.ability.claws: Increases the player's attack speed by %1$s%% for each consecutive attack performed within 3 seconds of the last. Otherwise, loses 1 charge per second. Attacking with an unfilled attack speed bar resets the accumulated charges.
tooltip.relics.feral_claws.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.antidote_vessel.descripti: Enhances the relic bearer's resistance to effects.
tooltip.relics.antidote_vessel.ability.a: Reduces the duration of negative effects received by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.antidote_vessel.ability.d: Each successful attack steals %1$s seconds from all positive effects present on the target.
tooltip.relics.antidote_vessel.leveling_: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
+%1$s experience points for each effect stolen using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.power_glove.description: Allows the relic bearer to perform empowered attacks.
tooltip.relics.power_glove.ability.power: Increases the player's damage dealt by %1$s%% but enters a 5-second cooldown after each attack.
tooltip.relics.power_glove.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.withered_bracelet.descrip: Fills the relic bearer's weapon with withering energy, affecting all it touches.
tooltip.relics.withered_bracelet.ability: Has a %1$s%% chance to apply the Wither effect to the attacked target for %2$s seconds.
Grants complete resistance to wither damage.
tooltip.relics.withered_bracelet.levelin: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.snowshoes.description: Improves the relic bearer's mobility in harsh snowy conditions.
tooltip.relics.snowshoes.ability.passive: Allows walking on powder snow without sinking.
tooltip.relics.snowshoes.ability.speed.d: Increases movement speed on snow by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.snowshoes.leveling_source: +%1$s experience points for every 3 seconds of movement on snow.
tooltip.relics.steadfast_spikes.descript: Firmly anchors the relic bearer's feet to any surface.
Increases resistance to knockback and slippery blocks by %1$s%%.
Allows slow wall sliding, negating fall damage.
tooltip.relics.steadfast_spikes.leveling: +%1$s experience points for each knockback reduced by the %2$s ability.
+%1$s experience points for every 3 seconds of sliding on blocks.
tooltip.relics.rooted_boots.description: Grants the relic bearer the mysterious power of a sheep.
tooltip.relics.rooted_boots.ability.devo: Every %1$s seconds transforms the grass block beneath the player into dirt, restoring 1 hunger and saturation point.
tooltip.relics.rooted_boots.leveling_sou: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.warp_drive.description: Allows the relic bearer to teleport their body over short distances.
tooltip.relics.warp_drive.ability.telepo: Teleports the player to a position along their line of sight within %1$s blocks, then goes on a cooldown for %2$s seconds.
Line of sight to teleport position
tooltip.relics.warp_drive.leveling_sourc: +%1$s experience points for every 10 blocks traversed using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.charm_of_shrinking.descri: Allows the relic bearer to shrink their body to access previously unreachable areas.
tooltip.relics.whoopee_cushion.descripti: Mysteriously increases the relic bearer's flatulence, leading to entirely unpredictable outcomes.
tooltip.relics.whoopee_cushion.ability.p: Has a %1$s%% chance to knock back entities within a %2$s block radius, applying a 10-second nausea effect when taking damage or crouching frequently.
tooltip.relics.whoopee_cushion.leveling_: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.kitty_slippers.descriptio: Grants the relic bearer feline traits, including soft paws and countless lives.
tooltip.relics.kitty_slippers.ability.pa: Scares away all Creepers and Phantoms near the player.
tooltip.relics.kitty_slippers.ability.fa: Increases safe falling height by %1$s blocks.
tooltip.relics.kitty_slippers.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each fall made safe by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.kitty_slippers.ability.re: Has a %1$s%% chance to save the player from fatal damage, leaving them with 1 health point.
tooltip.relics.kitty_slippers.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each point of damage from the last fatal attack prevented by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.bunny_hoppers.description: Strengthens the relic bearer's legs, allowing them to push off the ground more powerfully.
tooltip.relics.bunny_hoppers.ability.hol: Allows high jumps by continuously holding the jump key for up to %1$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.bunny_hoppers.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each high jump performed using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.charm_of_sinking.descript: Grants the relic bearer's legs the ability to absorb air from the ground.
While the player stands on the underwater floor, it blocks air consumption and slowly restores its supply by %1$s seconds every second.
tooltip.relics.charm_of_sinking.leveling: +%1$s experience points for each touch of the underwater floor.
tooltip.relics.panic_necklace.descriptio: Quickens the relic bearer's heartbeat, warning of impending danger.
tooltip.relics.panic_necklace.ability.pa: Increases the player's movement speed by %1$s%% for each mob within a %2$s blocks radius targeting the player for attack.
tooltip.relics.panic_necklace.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each instance of damage taken from mobs affected by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.helium_flamingo.descripti: Temporarily allows the relic bearer to glide through air as they would water.
tooltip.relics.helium_flamingo.ability.f: When performing a double jump, allows the player to float in the air for up to %1$s seconds. Movement speed in the air is proportional to the player's swimming speed with an additional bonus of %2$s%%.
tooltip.relics.helium_flamingo.leveling_: +%1$s experience points for each second of air swimming using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.pocket_piston.description: Grants the relic bearer's hands the strength of mechanisms.
tooltip.relics.pocket_piston.ability.dis: Increases knockback in melee attacks by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.pocket_piston.ability.int: Increases maximum interaction range with the world by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.pocket_piston.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each melee attack performed.
+%1$s experience points for each interaction with the world at the %2$s ability's extended range.
tooltip.relics.obsidian_skull.descriptio: Redirects heat aimed at harming the relic bearer onto itself.
tooltip.relics.obsidian_skull.ability.he: Completely absorbs damage from fire sources for up to %1$s seconds. If the player has not taken fire damage for 3 seconds, the absorption time regenerates each second.
tooltip.relics.obsidian_skull.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each second of fire damage absorption using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.fire_gauntlet.description: Grants the relic bearerâ€™s weapon the powers of the fire element.
tooltip.relics.fire_gauntlet.ability.cas: When attacking, releases several sparks that home in on nearby targets, igniting them for %3$s seconds and dealing %2$s%% of the performed attack's damage. The number of sparks is determined through repeated checks of a %1$s%% chance. Each successful check releases one additional spark, but the process stops as soon as the chance fails even once.
tooltip.relics.fire_gauntlet.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each target hit by a spark from the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.pickaxe_heater.descriptio: Concentrates surrounding heat precisely onto the relic bearer's tools.
tooltip.relics.pickaxe_heater.ability.he: Smelts any mined block if possible, consuming one charge from a buffer with a capacity of %1$s units. The buffer regenerates 1 charge every %2$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.pickaxe_heater.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each block smelted by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.chorus_totem.description: Allows the relic bearer to rewind time when making rash decisions.
tooltip.relics.chorus_totem.ability.past: Each attack against the relic bearer has a %1$s%% chance per percent of missing health to teleport the attacker to a random location within a %2$s block radius.
tooltip.relics.chorus_totem.leveling_sou: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.running_shoes.description: Strengthens the relic bearer's legs, allowing them to move faster.
tooltip.relics.running_shoes.ability.run: Increases the player's running speed by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.running_shoes.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each second of running.
tooltip.relics.flippers.description: Strengthens the relic bearer's legs, allowing them to swim faster.
Increases the player's swimming speed by %1$s%%.
+%1$s experience points for each second of swimming.
